titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, April 20, 1948

mods.tableOfContents: School Song-Chorus. Imaginary TV Show (In Color). Pep Squad - Uniforms. Yells and School Song. A Tour of School. Agriculture. Stock. Gardens. Homemaking. Model Homes. Home Economics. Indian Club Activities. Songs, Readings. Interviews - To Enroll. A student orientation to student life at Concho School Song
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
